Text: Shares have risen 44 percent over the past year. Including dividends, the returns have been 51 percent. Keppel DC will use the newly raised funds to expand its portfolio to S$2.58 billion, spread across 17 data centers globally.
Cause: Shares have risen 44 percent over the past year.
Effect: Keppel DC will use the newly raised funds to expand its portfolio to S$2.58 billion, spread across 17 data centers globally.
Sentence: <e1>Shares have risen 44 percent over the past year.</e1> Including dividends, the returns have been 51 percent. <e2>Keppel DC will use the newly raised funds to expand its portfolio to S$2.58 billion, spread across 17 data centers globally.</e2>
